info.title: PizzaShop
info.description:
REST API for managing a pizzeria.


The application includes the management of:
  • users (workers and customers)
  • company branches
  • products (variations like doughs, dimensions and toppings, categories)
  • orders (creation, management)

/company.summary: Path used to manage a single Company.
/company.description: The REST endpoint/path used to get and update single instances of an `Company`.  This path contains `GET`, and `PUT` operations used to perform the get and update tasks, respectively.

get.description: Gets the details of a single instance of a `Company`.

/branches.summary: Path used to manage the list of branches.
/branches.description: The REST endpoint/path used to list and create zero or more `Branch` entities.  This path contains a `GET` and `POST` operation to perform the list and create tasks, respectively.

200.description: Successful response - returns an array of `Branch` entities.

get.description: Gets a list of all `Branch` entities.

409.description: Fail primary check on `Branch`. Only one primary branch is permitted.

post.description: Creates a new instance of a `Branch`.

/branches/{branchId}.summary: Path used to manage a single Branch.
/branches/{branchId}.description: The REST endpoint/path used to get, update, and delete single instances of an `Branch`.  This path contains `GET`, `PUT`, and `DELETE` operations used to perform the get, update, and delete tasks, respectively.

get.description: Gets the details of a single instance of a `Branch`.

409.description: Fail primary check on `Branch`. Only one primary branch is permitted.

/branches/{branchId}/shippingzones.summary: Path used to manage the list of shippingzones.
/branches/{branchId}/shippingzones.description: The REST endpoint/path used to list and create zero or more `ShippingZone` entities.  This path contains a `GET` and `POST` operation to perform the list and create tasks, respectively.

200.description: Successful response - returns an array of `ShippingZone` entities.

get.description: Gets a list of all `ShippingZone` entities.

/groups.summary: Path used to manage the list of groups.
/groups.description: The REST endpoint/path used to list and create zero or more `Group` entities.  This path contains a `GET` and `POST` operation to perform the list and create tasks, respectively.

200.description: Successful response - returns an array of `Group` entities.

get.description: Gets a list of all `Group` entities.

post.description: Creates a new instance of a `Group`.

/groups/{groupId}.summary: Path used to manage a single Group.
/groups/{groupId}.description: The REST endpoint/path used to get, update, and delete single instances of an `Group`.  This path contains `GET`, `PUT`, and `DELETE` operations used to perform the get, update, and delete tasks, respectively.

get.description: Gets the details of a single instance of a `Group`.

/shippingmethods.summary: Path used to manage the list of shippingmethods.
/shippingmethods.description: The REST endpoint/path used to list and create zero or more `ShippingMethod` entities.  This path contains a `GET` and `POST` operation to perform the list and create tasks, respectively.

value.title: Cash on delivery
value.description: Paying for goods when they are delivered.

200.description: Successful response - returns an array of `ShippingMethod` entities.

get.description: Gets a list of all `ShippingMethod` entities.

post.description: Creates a new instance of a `ShippingMethod`.

/shippingmethods/{shippingmethodId}.summary: Path used to manage a single ShippingMethod.
/shippingmethods/{shippingmethodId}.description: The REST endpoint/path used to get, update, and delete single instances of an `ShippingMethod`.  This path contains `GET`, `PUT`, and `DELETE` operations used to perform the get, update, and delete tasks, respectively.

get.description: Gets the details of a single instance of a `ShippingMethod`.

/users.summary: Path used to manage the list of users.
/users.description: The REST endpoint/path used to list and create zero or more `User` entities.  This path contains a `GET` and `POST` operation to perform the list and create tasks, respectively.

200.description: Successful response - returns an array of `User` entities.

get.description: Gets a list of all `User` entities.

post.description: Creates a new instance of a `User`. Only 'WORKER' type can be created

/users/{userName}.summary: Path used to manage a single User.
/users/{userName}.description: The REST endpoint/path used to get, update, and delete single instances of an `User`.  This path contains `GET`, `PUT`, and `DELETE` operations used to perform the get, update, and delete tasks, respectively.

get.description: Gets the details of a single instance of a `User`.

/public/session.summary: Path used to manage the session operation

/public/session/refresh/{refreshToken}.summary: Path used to manage the session operation

post.description: Create new `Session` with a valid access token

parameters.name: refreshToken
parameters.description: Refresh token used for retrieve new updated session information

/variations/doughs/{doughId}.description: The REST endpoint/path used to get, update, and delete single instances of an `Dough`.  This path contains `GET`, `PUT`, and `DELETE` operations used to perform the get, update, and delete tasks, respectively.

/company/logo.summary: Path used to manage a Company logo image.
/company/logo.description:
The REST endpoint/path used to get and update single instances of an `Company` logo.  This path contains `GET` and `PUT` operations used to perform the get and update tasks, respectively.

Company logo specification:
Type: PNG
Optimal shape: square
Optimal size: 320x320px

get.description: Get a `Company` logo image

get.description: Gets the details of a single instance of a `Settings`.

/productcategories.description: The REST endpoint/path used to list and create zero or more `ProductCategory` entities.  This path contains a `GET` and `POST` operation to perform the list and create tasks, respectively.

parameters.name: includeDisabled

/public/confirm-registration/{username}.description: Confirm user registration with token and change status to 'Active'.

parameters.name: registrationToken
parameters.description: Valid token required to confirm registration

error.userMessage: Activation link expired or already used: request a new activation link

post.summary: Perform a confirm for a User registration
post.description: Complete `User` registration and change status to 'Active'

/public/registration-customer.description: The REST endpoint/path used to create zero or more `User` entities. This path contains a `POST` operation to perform the create tasks.

error.userMessage: Email already used by another user

post.description: Create a new instance of `User` with type 'CUSTOMER' and status "TO_CONFIRM"

/public/resend-confirm-registration-mail.description: The REST endpoint/path used to resend email with activation code to user. This path contains a `POST` operation to perform the tasks.

post.description: Resend email with activation code to user
